mapper.select: select * from news where n_no > 0 order by n_no desc limit #{startNum}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from news where n_no>0
mapper.insert: insert into news (n_title, n_writer, n_content, n_regdate, n_viewcnt) values (#{n_title}, #{n_writer}, #{n_content}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update news set n_title = #{n_title}, n_writer = #{n_writer}, n_content = #{n_content}, n_regdate = now() where n_no = #{n_no}
mapper.insert: insert into news_comm (n_no, user_no, nc_content, nc_regdate) values (#{n_no}, #{user_no}, #{nc_content}, now())
